trans-unit.source: Converts managed <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> objects to unmanaged Graphics Device Interface (GDI) [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structures, and vice versa.
None of the methods of this class will validate the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.
To validate it, use <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"></xref> class for the specified printer.
For more information on the DEVMODE structure, see [DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565).
The name of the printer that is bound to the new <xref href="System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"></xref> instance.
The Print Schema version to use in the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> and DEVMODE conversion.
deviceName is .
clientPrintSchemaVersion is 0 or less.
The converter was unable to bind to deviceName.
Converts the specified [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure to a managed code <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>.
For more information on the DEVMODE structure, see [DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565).
The scope of the returned <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> is the entire print job.
This method does not validate the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.
To validate it, use <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>.
A <xref:System.Byte> array that contains the DEVMODE structure.
The new managed <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>.
This <xref href="System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"></xref> is already disposed.
The value of devMode is .
The content of devMode is not well-formed.
The conversion failed.
Converts the specified [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure to a managed code <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that has the specified scope.
This method does not validate the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.
To validate it, use <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>.
For more information on the DEVMODE structure, see [DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565).
A <xref:System.Byte> buffer containing the DEVMODE structure to convert.
A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicketScope"></xref> value that specifies whether the new <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> applies to a page, a document, or an entire print job.
The new <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>.
This <xref href="System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"></xref> is already disposed.
The value of devMode is null ( in Visual Basic).
The content of devMode is not well-formed.
The conversion failed.
The scope is not a valid value.

Converts the specified managed <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> to an unmanaged [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure that is based on the [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure identified by the <xref href="System.Printing.Interop.BaseDevModeType"></xref>.
The scope of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> parameter must be the entire print job.
This method does not validate the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.
To validate it, use <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>.
For more information on the DEVMODE structure, see [DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565).
The <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> to convert.
A value that identifies whether to use the user default or printer default DEVMODE as the base DEVMODE.
A <xref:System.Byte> array that contains the new [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure.
This <xref href="System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"></xref> is already disposed.
The value of printTicket is null ( in Visual Basic).
The content of printTicket is not well-formed.
The conversion failed.
The baseType is not a valid value.

Converts the specified managed code <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> with the specified scope, into an unmanaged [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure that is based on the [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure identified by the <xref href="System.Printing.Interop.BaseDevModeType"></xref>.
This method does not validate the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.
To validate it, use <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>.
For more information on the DEVMODE structure, see [DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565).
The <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> to convert.
A value that identifies whether to use the user default or printer default DEVMODE as the base DEVMODE.

A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicketScope"></xref> value that specifies whether the conversion of the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> should be done at the scope of a page, a document, or an entire print job.
A <xref:System.Byte> buffer that represents the new [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure.
This <xref href="System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"></xref> is already disposed.
The value of printTicket is null ( in Visual Basic).
The content of printTicket is not well-formed.
The conversion failed.
The baseType is not a valid value.
-or- The scope is not a valid value.
Releases the resources used by the <xref href="System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"></xref>.
Gets the maximum [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) version that <xref href="System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"></xref> can support.
The maximum [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) version that <xref href="System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"></xref> can support.
Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"></xref> class.
Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter>.
The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter> in an unusable state.

After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter> was occupying.
For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
> [!NOTE] > Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter>.
Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter> object's `Finalize` method.
